General.Name: Ningbo Boway Alloy Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Boway Alloy Material Company Limited researches, develops, manufactures, and sells non-ferrous alloy materials in Asia, Europe, North America, and internationally. It offers alloy strips; easy-to-cut alloys, wear-resistant and corrosion resistant alloys, lead-free environment-friendly easy-to-cut alloys, high-speed easy-to-cut alloys, and high-precision wrought alloys; and precision alloy wires, including high-conductivity chromium-zirconium-copper alloys, wear-resistant bronze alloys, high-plastic brass alloys, high-corrosion-resistance cupronickel alloys, and environment-friendly alloys. In addition, it offers monocrystalline PERC cells, and monofacial and bifacial PV modules. The company's products are used in aerospace, high-speed rail, electronics, telecommunication, automobile, ship, engineering machine, precision molding, lead frame, household appliance, and bathroom hardware industries. Ningbo Boway Alloy Material Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: Yinzhou Economic Development Zone, Ningbo, China
